data.oai_dc:dc: zooplankton, phytoplankton, macro-invertebrates, environmental conditions, interconnected fish ponds

The De Maten pond dataset contains data on local pond conditions and taxonomic community composition of phytoplankton, zooplankton, macro-invertebrates and fish from 34 interconnected fish ponds in the "De Maten" nature reserve (Limburg, Belgium).
